description:
Wind- and water-resistant jacket in hardwearing, rustle-free G-1000 Silent Eco with Hydratic that keeps you comfortably dry in changeable weather. Lightly padded with high-performance synthetic G-Loft Supreme Compact for extra warmth on cold days. A simple, classic jacket with the basic features you need for a good day in the forest, and its toned-down style works just as well at work and in other urban contexts.

Reinforcements in G-1000 HeavyDuty Eco give extra durability on the shoulders and elbows. The front zipper is two-way and has a protective flap with press buttons at the collar and hem to stop cold winds. Small items can be stored in several practical pockets; a Napoleon pocket, large bellows pockets with flaps lower down and two inside storage pockets – perfect for gloves, an extra hat etc. In addition, there are easily accessible hand pockets that give fast warmth for cold fingers. Button adjustment at the waist. Sleeve cuffs have leather edging and can also be adjusted with buttons.
name: Fjallraven Sormland Padded Jacket - Mens
